vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Included with: ὑπερεκ-χέω,
pour out over, metaphorically, εἰς τὴν ἐπαρχίαν τὰς τιμάς [Refs 1st c.AD+]:—passive, overflow, [LXX+1st c.BC+]:—also ὑπερεκ-χύνομαι in [NT]; future -χυθήσομαι variant in [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to be running over, overflowing overflow
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be running over, overflowing overflow
to pour out above measure, or in excess; passive to run over, overflow, Lk. 6:38*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: làm ngập tràn; đầy tràn. ὑπέρ (G5228) và ἐκχέω (G1632)
